about_the_game:
Fallen Seeds II continues the thrilling sci-fi adventure of Evod and his companions Ada, Lily, Sif, Ophelia, and Kaya. This second part of the trilogy delves deeper into the mysteries of Ulthar and brings the story to its climax. Players can either pick up where they left off in the first part or start directly from the second part with a quick recap of previous events.

Join Evod as he navigates the political intrigues and hidden dangers of Ulthar. The Anomalous Zone, a mysterious and perilous area, remains a focal point of the conflict, with powerful Galactic forces converging on its secrets. Your choices will continue to shape the story, determining alliances, enmities, and the fate of the characters.

The narrative remains rich and multifaceted, combining humor, romance, and drama against a backdrop of interstellar conflict. Hand-animated cutscenes and vivid art bring the world to life, ensuring an immersive experience.

The game offers multiple routes and endings, expanding on the choices made in the first part. With new characters, locations, and music, Fallen Seeds II promises an engaging continuation of the saga.

name: Fallen Seeds II

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium / AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium / AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Continue Evod's adventure on the enigmatic planet of Ulthar, unraveling deeper mysteries and navigating political intrigues with his companions Ada, Lily, Sif, Ophelia, and Kaya.
